**Regulatory Affairs Support Services**
**Services de soutien aux affaires réglementaires**

## Tender Details
* **Tender Reference Number**: W6369-22-A062/D
* **Closing Date**: 28 September 2023 at 14:00 (local time)
* **Publication Date**: 12 September 2023

## Contract Overview
The Department of National Defence (DND) is seeking professional services for a team of regulatory affairs specialists to prepare and file regulatory submissions to meet Health Canada (HC) regulations for drugs and medical devices. The team will be responsible for:
* Preparing and filing regulatory submissions for drugs and medical devices
* Meeting Health Canada's regulations
* Collaborating with stakeholders to ensure compliance
* Providing expertise in regulatory affairs

## Requirements
The team will consist of:
* Two (2) Strategic Level Resources (Regulatory Affairs Professionals)
* Two (2) General Level Resources
* One (1) Administrative Level Resource

## Security Clearance
Reliability Clearance is required for this contract.

## Contract Period
The contract will run for an initial period of 2 years from contract award until March 31, 2025, with three (3) option periods of one year each for a maximum potential end date of March 31, 2028.

## Notice Details
* **Notice Type**: Request for Proposal
* **Procurement Method**: Competitive - Open bidding
* **Selection Criteria**: Highest Combined Rating of Technical Merit and Price

## Trade Agreements
This tender is subject to the following trade agreements:
* Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA)
* North American Free Trade Agreement (NAFTA)
* Canada-European Union Comprehensive Economic and Trade Agreement (CETA)
* Canada-Peru Free Trade Agreement (CPFTA)
* Comprehensive and Progressive Agreement for Trans-Pacific Partnership (CPTPP)

## Tender Documentation
Tender documentation is available on [Canada Bids] website.
